entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southwestern sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
